mission.posting: Kurisu wants help investigating the location of someone.

email.subject: Kurisu - Investigation
email.body: I never expected you to do this with me, #PLAYERNAME#. I'm thankful for the help. Over the past few months, I've been investigating someone from my past. His name is Shou Makise. I've been tracking him down. I need help in finding him. I'll link you to the last place I could track him at, from about a year ago. If you find anything, like an IP, please let me know. -Kurisu

attachments.note: Help Kurisu track down Shou Makise Investigate the link she has provided Attach anything that may help her, like an IP
